question: When was the National Horticulture board established?
explanation: National Horticulture Board (NHB) was set up in 1984 on the basis of recommendations of the "Group on Perishable Agricultural Commodities", headed by Dr. M. S. Swaminathan. Its Headquarters is at Gurugram. Its objective is to improve the integrated development of the Horticulture industry and to help in coordinating, sustaining the production and processing of fruits and vegetables.
